about_the_game:
Race through voxel tracks that go on forever, collecting regular item drops as you go—unless a toll or lack of fuel decides to slow you down. But don’t worry, you’re in control! Simply click to clear those annoying tolls or refuel your car when the gas light’s on. The faster you click, the sooner you get back on track, with those sweet drops just around the corner.

No upgrades, no fancy power-ups—just you, your car, and the satisfaction of clicking your way through each obstacle. The car may slow down now and then, but who said you can’t have fun while waiting?

Perfect for the IDLE player who loves a little challenge, a lot of clicks, and zero pressure. So, ready to fuel up and drive toward your next drop? Infinity R is waiting!

Drop statistics:

  • Start at 2KM, then increase by 1.6 times each successful drop

  • Drop chances are 1 out of 12 from the game

  • Every 10 successful drops, ratio start from the base again

  • Common: 70%, Uncommon 19.9%, Rare 6.8%, Epic 2.8%,  Legendary 0.5%

  • Maximum 20 drops per day, Minimum 2 Minutes of playtime required to receive drops

short_description: Welcome to Infinity R, an IDLE where the road is endless, the drops are regular, and the only thing standing between you and victory is... well, a bunch of pesky tolls and a never-ending fuel gauge!
